mapper.select: select c.id, u.name AS creator, c.remark, c.`key` from nps.client c left join nps.user u on c.creator = u.id;

select c.id, u.name AS creator, c.remark, c.`key` from nps.client c left join nps.user u on c.creator = u.id where c.`key` like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or c.remark like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or c.id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or u.name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%');
